title: God Bless U Mamey Lyrics
stanzas:
Readya maamey
maamey vibe yaethu
maamey sound yaethe

damma damma dammaaluma de
danguvaaru daaraavidum kaimaaluma de
dumma dumma meiyaaluma, hey
adicha goalu vachaa sealu nammaalumaa

hey pisuru thattiyum joku kuththa
aayidum raja aabaththaa
hey pattunu poonthu muttalanu
vachiduvom davulatha

dhilluthan dheena
alluthaan nona
ittaka pittaka dumpakthaa
hey maafia manaa
billa don-aa
potudvuom mankaathaa

GBU maamey god bless you
maamey
GBU maamey god bless you
maamey

bad trippa thanthaanganaa
quicka kadhaiya mudichu vidu
friendshipaa vandhaagannaa
party kuduthuvidu

ruthelessaaga irunthaanganna
heart-lessaa thattividu
yen aala ne thodanumnaa
enna nee thaandi thodu

thakkaluthaan nakkaluthaan
nakkalu asal poweruthaan
vikkaluthaan nikkaluthaan
ninnu paaru ethirathaan

jabaruthaan jabarathaan
punchu vittaa adhiruthaan
mattonuthaan mattonuthaan
maattikitta mattanuthaan

GBU maamey…
God Bless U blast-ey…
AK on fire… AK on fire…
Maamey… ready-ah maamey…
Maamey… ready-ah maamey…

ellaa dudes-kum sollikiren
naan paathuten pala tools
sketcha potta sambavam
aaru maniku flash news
senja thappa alasi paaththaa
maataathu oru clues
nee sirichi pesi kaala vaarnaa
meerapadum rules

thuppaaki vachi varum
saththam enaku thaalaatu paatu
kaththiya urasi varum
satham enaku melody beatu
mulusa suthi unna kathara viduven
gatelaam pootu
ennathaan pannaalum unaku
enmela varaathu hate- u

yaena,Cute-u white-u salt pepper-u
Sedhukkapatta sale…
Enga aala oorkulla
Konji koopiduvaom thal…
Dei…
God Bless U… AK…

GBU maamey…
God Bless U blast-ey…
AK on fire… AK on fire…
category: Song:God Bless U - Good Bad Ugly

seo.title: God Bless U Mamey Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete God Bless U Mamey Lyrics  from Good Bad Ugly. Read the lyrics penned by Vignesh Shivan and composed by GV PrakashKumar and sung by Anirudh. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vignesh Shivan, Good Bad Ugly, GV PrakashKumar, Anirudh, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
